titleStmt.title: Ten sermons preached by that eminent divine, Matthew Killiray, B.D. ... ; to which are added excellent set forms of prayer and graces for children.
titleStmt.author: Killiray, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: some parts stained, tightly bound and with print show-through.
Advertisements: facing t.p., and at end of second and fourth pts.
Works are bound and filmed in different order from that given on t.p.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

(From title page) The godly mans gain, and the wicked mans woe -- The sinners sobs -- The swearer and the drunkard -- The ready way to get riches -- The short and sure way to grace and salvation -- The touch-stone of a Christian -- The path-way to saving knowledge -- Every mans duty -- The way to Heaven made plain -- The Christians comfort -- A new book containing sundry set-forms of prayers, thanksgivings, and graces.
